title: Research Participation Consent
content:
Thank you for your interest in participating in this research study. This study aims to understand how people communicate and collaborate in online conversations.

By participating, you agree to:
- Have your conversation messages recorded and stored for research purposes
- Allow researchers to analyze the content of your conversations
- Understand that your identity will remain anonymous

Your participation is voluntary. You may leave at any time without penalty.
checkboxes: I consent to data collection for research purposes
